si.title: මොණරගල දිස්ත්රික්කයේ අවසාන මැතිවරණ ප්රති results ල

en.title: The final election results of the Moneragala district

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the Moneragala district election results in 200 characters:
Moneragala district election results: [Candidate names] won [number] seats. [Party names] secured [percentage]% of votes. Turnout was [percentage]%. Key issues were [brief mentions of major topics].
